name: OpenWAR
tagline: An augmented reality library for Windows Phone.
body:
OpenWAR is an Augmented Reality SDK for Windows Phone. It is designed to give easy marker-based tracking to all developers.

### Graphics
To overlay content, pass in a Direct3D object.

### Tracking
We use OpenCV for tracking by default.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
